name: Ilustraciones Tradicionales
prompt: High-quality hand-drawn illustration using pencil, ink, or watercolor, detailed and realistic, with consistent proportions and clear lines

name: Arte Digital
prompt: High-resolution digital art with modern visuals, sharp details, vibrant colors, and realistic textures, ensuring clear and coherent subjects

name: Estilo de Cómic o Manga
prompt: Clean illustration in comic or manga style, with consistent proportions, expressive characters, and defined outlines

name: Estilo Acuarela
prompt: Soft watercolor effect image, with delicate details, harmonious colors, and well-defined subjects

name: Estilo Cartoon
prompt: Colorful cartoon-style drawing with exaggerated features, clear lines, consistent anatomy, and vibrant colors

name: Estilo Infantil
prompt: Simple, colorful drawing appealing to children, with friendly characters, clear shapes, and proportionate features

name: Fotografías
prompt: High-quality edited photograph matching the story's tone, with clear subjects and natural lighting

name: Collage
prompt: Unique composition combining various images, with clear elements and harmonious arrangement

name: Estilo Retro o Vintage
prompt: Illustration with a nostalgic, vintage feel, using muted colors and classic design elements, ensuring clear and well-defined subjects

name: Minimalista
prompt: Simple and clean image with minimal details, focusing on essential elements with clear lines

name: Estilo Realista
prompt: Detailed illustration representing reality faithfully, with accurate proportions and lifelike textures

name: Arte Conceptual
prompt: Image conveying abstract ideas or concepts, with clear symbolism and thoughtful composition

name: Surrealismo
prompt: Illustration combining real and fantastical elements, with imaginative scenes and coherent blending of subjects

name: Estilo 3D
prompt: High-quality three-dimensional rendered image, with realistic lighting and textures, and consistent proportions

name: Arte Naíf
prompt: Naive-style illustration with bright colors, simple forms, and childlike perspective, ensuring clear subjects

name: Pixel Art
prompt: Pixelated image evoking retro video games, with clear sprites and consistent pixel size

name: Estilo Pop Art
prompt: Image with vivid colors and pop culture themes, bold lines, and clear, well-defined subjects

name: Arte Abstracto
prompt: Abstract illustration using shapes and colors to convey emotions, with harmonious composition and clear visual impact
